sentences.en: Finally a break for upstate New Yorkers.
sentences.cn: 最终纽约北部的天气被打破.

sentences.en: Five women were meeting in Seneca Falls in upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 五名妇女聚集在纽约州北部的塞尼卡福尔斯.

sentences.en: Helps arrive for snow buried upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 救援人员到达了被大雪覆盖的纽约北部.

sentences.en: Hillary planned to focus on boosting the upstate economy.
sentences.cn: 希拉里把重点集中在振兴北方经济.

sentences.en: I get her up to 160 when I take her upstate.
sentences.cn: 如果开到城外,我可以加速到160.

sentences.en: In 1969, the Woodstock Music and Art Fair opened in upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 1969年.伍德斯托克音乐节在纽约州东南部举行!

sentences.en: No relief in sight for residents sucked in by snow in upstate NewYork.
sentences.cn: 一点也看不出纽约北部的居民在这次大雪中有丝毫放松.

sentences.en: No relief in sight for residents sucked in by snow upstate NewYork.
sentences.cn: 救援部队已经到达了皑皑白雪覆盖的纽约州北部地区.

sentences.en: She is a native of upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 她的家乡在纽约州北部.

sentences.en: She spent the mid - 1940 s at the writers'colony, Yaddo, in upstate New York.
sentences.cn: 40年代 中期,她是在纽约州北部的作家庄园耶多度过的.

sentences.en: The park was created to preserve some of the forests upstate.
sentences.cn: 这个公园是为了保护该州最北部地区的一些森林而建的。

sentences.en: There is a town upstate, two days to the north, in the Hudson Highlands.
sentences.cn: 有个城镇, 2天到北方, 在哈森高地.

sentences.en: These buses will carry families upstate to visit relatives in prison.
sentences.cn: 这些公共汽车将载着家属北上去探监。

sentences.en: They retired and went to live upstate.
sentences.cn: 他们退休后移居到州的乡野地区去了。

trans.tran_en: in the northern part of a particular state

trans.tran_cn: 在（或向）州的乡野地区（尤指北部）
